title: 643 - Weathered Weathervane
description: Take me home, to bed, down some country roads, on a ride with Scoots on a search for the elusive Mountain Mama’s. Don’t forget to make the toast of it. (story at 16:39) Commission a Song from Jonathan Mann @ song.jonathanmann.net   Make sure to subscribe to “This Is Love” from our friends over at Criminal!!! https://www.thisislovepodcast.com/   Thanks to all the listeners who barter pizzas and coffees for a month a good sleep by becoming patrons @ http://www.sleepwithmepodcast.com/patron
